name: FullDrift Demo
description:
[Note] This game is a demo of FullDrift and is not a finished product.

Description

FullDrift is a drifting racing game where the road gets generated based on the music you choose. Try to get the fastest track time with the highest score!

FullDrift is made by Tymon Versmoren, Mitchell Bekke & Wouter Besse in 8 weeks for a HKU assignment and will be developed futher after this.
